Text.Page:
Would you like to do some crafting today? Please say "yes!"

Wonderful! It's my day off. Not officially. Actually...I told {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} I'm sick, so I'm sure she'll need your fine crafting skills.

See? We both win!

Good to see you!

Taratia is sick, and Barian needs a highly-skilled crafter today. Actually, I'm sure he'll be happier to work with you. And a day without Taratia bugging me is like a vacation day. Deliver your completed work to {@LinkCreature:63#3001#Barian}.

Fabulous work, as usual.

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will settle up with you. I hear she's feeling well enough to make payments.

Make linsteel ingots and bring them to me.

Oh, by the way, are you interested in joining the Hands of Velika? Did I already ask you that? Not interested?

I understand, soldier, you're very busy.

Thanks, .

See {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} for payment. I hear she's feeling well enough to pay bills.
Make some aerosilex and bring it to me. Should be no problem if you have the chops...and I know you do.

, that was fast!

Tell {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} I said you deserve a tip, especially as she's playing hooky today.

Make some boscleather and bring it to me as soon as you're finished. I need it for some armor I'm working on.

Elthienne plans to send a Hands of Velika member out on a dangerous mission. We Hands make sure our members are well-protected in the field.

I hope you'll come back soon, . Your work is top-notch.

Oh, will you tell {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} I said she's a lying sack of hyena dung? Sure, she's sick. We can't all take a mental health day, you know.

Craft some sylvacloth and bring it to me.

Thanks for all your hard work, .

Nice work. You're giving me a run for my money, that's for sure.

Guess I'd better not take too many "sick" days with you around. I'll be out of a job!
